job.title: Junior Software Engineer - Cloud Applications
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Defense & Space,Computer Software
job.description: Are you starting your career in Software Engineering Are you eager creative and passionate about creating innovative and meaningful solutions that help us solve national security problems If you are interested in using your talents to help develop nextgeneration software applications that will improve the speed and accuracy of intelligence gathering and information understanding then Expedition Technology is the team to joinbrbrWe are seeking juniorearlycareer Software Engineers who will work alongside a team of talented developers that are building the future of intelligence applications We hire people who are eager intellectually curious and creative while empowering them to innovate with flexibility and autonomybrbrIf you join our team youll work with an extremely talented motivated supportive and welcoming team in an Agile ecosystem Youll work alongside experienced engineers while performing fullstack software development including the design development troubleshooting and debugging of cuttingedge software programs and products You will work together with your team to determine overall application design gather requirements develop tools and enhancements and deploy enterprisewide solutions Youll also help develop solutions to complex issues that involve employing creativity technical prowess and outofthebox thinking to achieve resultsbrbrDoes that sound like a challenge youd like to embracebrbrstronguHere Are Some Skills That Will Help You SucceedbrustrongulliUnited States Citizenship  All candidates must be US Citizens due to the need for a US Government issued security clearance of Top Secret or higher lili12 years of fullstack development experience can include software engineeringfocused internships of Cloudbased integrating Kubernetes or other containerized ecosystems liliUnderstanding of relational database design implementation configuration and query experience such as MySQL PostgreSQL PostGIS MongoDB andor similarliliExperience with some of the following programming languages Python Java andor C and frameworks Nodejs Angularjs and React need not have experience with all Most of our developers write Python andor JavaScriptliliTesting experience with tools such as Storybook Jest Cypress mswliliComfortable working with Linuxbased operating systems command line operations and video and image understanding We seek to utilize machine learningartificial intelligence to advance our understanding of signals and systems in a rapidly changing environment Many of our efforts have transitioned to Phase II or III programs designed to advance the use of artificial intelligence in the signal processing domainbrbrstrongWhat do we offer our teambrbrstrongWe are proud that our
